statements: SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date, feedback FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_type IN ('Query', 'Feedback') ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY inquiry_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_type = 'Technical Support' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_name, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY inquiry_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inquiries FROM customer_inquiries GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_inquiries > 1;
SELECT CONCAT(customer_name, ' - ', inquiry_type) AS inquiry_info, feedback FROM customer_inquiries WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 50;
SELECT SUM(LENGTH(feedback)) AS total_feedback_length FROM customer_inquiries;
SELECT * FROM inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date FROM inquiries WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_id < 5
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM inquiries ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > NOW() LIMIT 10;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_name, inquiry_text, DATE(inquiry_date) AS inquiry_date FROM inquiries WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, customer_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(inquiry_id) AS total_inquiries FROM inquiries GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_inquiries > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(LENGTH(feedback_text)) AS avg_feedback_length FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_date, ticket_status FROM SupportTickets WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, assigned_support_agent FROM SupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_date, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_status, assigned_support_agent FROM SupportTickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT MAX(inquiry_date) AS latest_inquiry_date, MIN(feedback_date) AS earliest_feedback_date FROM CustomerInquiries, CustomerFeedback;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE inquiry_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, email, phone_number FROM SupportAgents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description, assignee, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, customer_name FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE assignee = 'John Doe'
SELECT agent_name, email FROM SupportAgents
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries;
SELECT inquiry_id, customer_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, contact_type, contact_date FROM CustomerContacts ORDER BY contact_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE closed_date IS NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, inquiry_text FROM CustomerInquiries WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerContacts WHERE contact_type = 'Email' AND agent_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE closed_date IS NULL ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
